mapper.select: SELECT a.*, IFNULL(count(b.video_seq),0) as videoCnt FROM member a LEFT JOIN video b ON a.member_seq = b.member_seq ORDER BY a.member_seq desc LIMIT #{defaultVO.pageSize} OFFSET #{defaultVO.offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_pw, member_nick) VALUES (#{member.memberId}, #{member.memberPw}, #{member.memberNick})
